messages.body: $TSLA Tesla partnership with $HD for solar panel https://www.designretailonline.com/news/retail/tesla-enter-retail-partnership-home-depot/?utm_source=SilverpopMailing&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=Daily+Newsletter+02.02.2018+%281%29&utm_content

links.title: Tesla to Enter Retail Partnership with The Home Depot | design:retail
links.description: Palo Alto, Calif.-based sustainable automotive company Tesla has announced plans to introduce retail shops within 800 locations of The Home Depot. The Atlanta-based home improvement retailer will showcase the company's solar power technology in 84-sq.-ft. units, some of which will host onsite demonstrations, The Verge reports.

links.title: Uber Wants to Make It Illegal to Operate Your Own Self-Driving Car in Cities
links.description: Beleaguered ridesourcing giant Uber has been criticized for a wide variety of sins, both real and imagined. But their biggest sin yet may be what they apparently want to do to the public in the future: force everybody to use Uber's service by outlawing private automobiles.
